items.sentence: Why did you tell Tom that we're just friends?
When was the last time that you ate an apple?
Tom was just thirteen years old at that time.
Tom told everybody he didn't know what to do.
Tom told Mary that he didn't need to do that.
Tom told Mary that he didn't have to do that.
Tom thought that Mary was talking about John.
Tom said he wanted to become a famous singer.
Tom is one of the ugliest people that I know.
Tom is convinced that Mary shouldn't do that.
Tom has given me something that I don't want.
Tom has decided he's not going to work today.
Tom didn't tell anybody he wanted to do that.
Tom didn't know you were planning to do that.
Tom didn't know that Mary had gone to Boston.
Tom didn't know he had to do that by himself.
Tom can play the piano much better than Mary.
Things don't always happen the way we'd like.
Do you enjoy playing cards with your brother?
Would you rather play volleyball or watch it?
I don't like to travel with a lot of luggage.
Tom promised he'd call as soon as he arrived.
If I'd had the money, I would've bought that.
I suspect that you have conspired against me.
The news that Tom had won surprised everyone.
Tom must've spent a fortune on his new house.
Did you really think Tom and I were a couple?
Tom is a good husband and a wonderful father.
I couldn't help but notice Tom staring at me.
My husband never helps me with the housework.
Tom and I are having dinner together tonight.
I want Tom to stay at home with the children.
Tom is the most charming man I have ever met.
My mother wants me to wear her wedding dress.
Three years ago today, Tom and I got married.
I bought everything that Tom asked me to buy.
Tom might not like what we're planning to do.
Tom wants to buy a birthday present for Mary.
All my neighbors have bigger yards than I do.
Tom rummaged about in his rucksack for a pen.
What counts for Tom is quantity, not quality.
If you're not with us then you're against us.
Is there any possibility that that'll happen?
Do you really want to lead this kind of life?
Do you have a calculator that I could borrow?
If Tom is helping you, he could also help us.
Will you be able to keep Tom from doing that?
I really don't know how often Tom goes there.
Tom wanted to know if you've heard from Mary.
Tom wanted to go out to get something to eat.
